parameter.value:
<script>

function getParam(p) {
var match = RegExp('[?&]' + p + '=([^&]*)').exec(window.location.search);
return match && decodeURIComponent(match[1].replace(/\+/g, ' '));
}

function getExpiryRecord(value) {
var expiryPeriod = 90 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000; // 90 day expiry in milliseconds

var expiryDate = new Date().getTime() + expiryPeriod;
return {
value: value,
expiryDate: expiryDate
};
}

function addGclid() {
var gclidParam = getParam('gclid');
var gclidRecord = null;


var gclsrcParam = getParam('gclsrc');
var isGclsrcValid = !gclsrcParam || gclsrcParam.indexOf('aw') !== -1;


if (gclidParam && isGclsrcValid) {
gclidRecord = getExpiryRecord(gclidParam);
localStorage.setItem('gclid', JSON.stringify(gclidRecord));
}


}

addGclid(); 
 //window.addEventListener('load', addGclid);

</script>

tag.name: Send GCLID Conversion Data to Google Script

parameter.value:
<script>
(function(){
  var SCRIPT_URL = 'https://script.google.com/macros/s/AKfycbztfY7LkOzAQgil9uPjRjYmYgyuPy6Repn4r7VuhFjrjLdPrMRKLelMjshlNO2OxPiw/exec';

  // --- Get values from localStorage ---
  function getLS(key){ try { return localStorage.getItem(key) || ''; } catch(e){ return ''; } }
  var hashed_email = getLS('hashed_email');
  var hashed_phone_number = getLS('hashed_phone');
  var gclid = '';
  try {
    var raw = localStorage.getItem('gclid');
    if (raw) {
      var parsed = JSON.parse(raw);
      gclid = parsed && parsed.value ? parsed.value : parsed;
    }
  } catch(e){ gclid = raw || ''; }

  // --- Format timestamp ---
  function formatDate(d){
    function p(n){return (n<10?'0':'')+n;}
    return d.getFullYear()+'-'+p(d.getMonth()+1)+'-'+p(d.getDate())+' '+p(d.getHours())+':'+p(d.getMinutes())+':'+p(d.getSeconds());
  }
  var conversion_event_time = formatDate(new Date());

  // --- Build query string ---
  function qs(obj){
    var arr=[],k;
    for(k in obj){ if(obj.hasOwnProperty(k)) arr.push(encodeURIComponent(k)+'='+encodeURIComponent(obj[k])); }
    return arr.join('&');
  }

  // --- Send data only if valid ---
  if (hashed_email || hashed_phone_number || gclid) {
    var url = SCRIPT_URL + '?' + qs({
      gclid: gclid,
      conversion_event_time: conversion_event_time,
      hashed_email: hashed_email,
      hashed_phone_number: hashed_phone_number
    });

    var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
    xhr.open('GET', url, true);
    xhr.send();
  }
})();
</script>

setupTag.tagName: Send Email and Phone to localstorage

tag.name: Send Email and Phone to localstorage

parameter.value:
<script>
(function(){
  // --- Select your fields ---
  var emailEl = document.querySelector('#ContactForm-email');
  var phoneEl = document.querySelector('#ContactForm-phone');
  if (!emailEl && !phoneEl) return;

  // --- Helper: UTF-8 encode ---
  function encodeUTF8(str){
    if (window.TextEncoder) return new TextEncoder().encode(str);
    var out=[],p=0,i,c;
    for(i=0;i<str.length;i++){c=str.charCodeAt(i);
      if(c<128) out[p++]=c;
      else if(c<2048){out[p++]=(c>>6)|192; out[p++]=(c&63)|128;}
      else{out[p++]=(c>>12)|224; out[p++]=((c>>6)&63)|128; out[p++]=(c&63)|128;}
    }
    return new Uint8Array(out);
  }

  // --- Helper: SHA-256 hash to hex ---
  function sha256Hex(str){
    if(!window.crypto||!window.crypto.subtle){return Promise.resolve('');}
    return window.crypto.subtle.digest('SHA-256', encodeUTF8(str)).then(function(buf){
      var bytes=new Uint8Array(buf),hex='',i,h;
      for(i=0;i<bytes.length;i++){h=bytes[i].toString(16);hex+=(h.length===1?'0'+h:h);}
      return hex;
    });
  }

  // --- Normalize functions ---
  function normEmail(v){return (v||'').replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,'').toLowerCase();}
  function normPhone(v){return (v||'').replace(/[^\d]/g,'');}

  var emailVal = normEmail(emailEl ? emailEl.value : '');
  var phoneVal = normPhone(phoneEl ? phoneEl.value : '');

  // --- Hash and store in localStorage ---
  Promise.all([
    emailVal ? sha256Hex(emailVal) : Promise.resolve(''),
    phoneVal ? sha256Hex(phoneVal) : Promise.resolve('')
  ]).then(function(res){
    try {
      if(res[0]) localStorage.setItem('hashed_email', res[0]);
      if(res[1]) localStorage.setItem('hashed_phone', res[1]);
      console.log('Hashed values stored in localStorage');
    } catch(e) {
      console.error('Failed to store hashed data', e);
    }
  });
})();
</script>
